title: Building editor missing dependency on gazebo msgs?

content.html:
Once in a while during parallel compile, I get:

Building CXX object gazebo/gui/building/CMakeFiles/gazebo_building.dir/BuildingModelManip.cc.o
cd /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo/gui/building && /usr/bin/c++   -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_NO_DEBUG -s -O3 -DNDEBUG  -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic -msse -msse2 -mfpmath=sse -msse3 -mssse3 -msse4.1 -msse4.2  -s -O3 -DNDEBUG  -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic -msse -msse2 -mfpmath=sse -msse3 -mssse3 -msse4.1 -msse4.2 -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/test/gtest/include -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/deps -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo/gui/building -isystem /home/hsu/local/include/OGRE/RTShaderSystem -isystem /home/hsu/local/include -isystem /home/hsu/local/include/OGRE -I/usr/include/qt4 -I/usr/include/qt4/QtGui -I/usr/include/qt4/QtCore    -fPIC -o CMakeFiles/gazebo_building.dir/BuildingMaker.cc.o -c /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/gui/building/BuildingMaker.cc
cd /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo/gui/building && /usr/bin/c++   -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_NO_DEBUG -s -O3 -DNDEBUG  -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic -msse -msse2 -mfpmath=sse -msse3 -mssse3 -msse4.1 -msse4.2  -s -O3 -DNDEBUG  -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic -msse -msse2 -mfpmath=sse -msse3 -mssse3 -msse4.1 -msse4.2 -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/test/gtest/include -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/deps -I/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo/gui/building -isystem /home/hsu/local/include/OGRE/RTShaderSystem -isystem /home/hsu/local/include -isystem /home/hsu/local/include/OGRE -I/usr/include/qt4 -I/usr/include/qt4/QtGui -I/usr/include/qt4/QtCore    -fPIC -o CMakeFiles/gazebo_building.dir/BuildingModelManip.cc.o -c /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/gui/building/BuildingModelManip.cc
In file included from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:22:0,
                 from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/rendering/Visual.hh:31,
                 from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo/gui/building/../../../../gazebo/gui/building/BuildingModelManip.hh:23,
                 from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo/gui/building/moc_BuildingModelManip.cxx:10:
/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo/msgs/MessageTypes.hh:2:22: fatal error: axis.pb.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
In file included from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/rendering/Camera.hh:40:0,
                 from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/rendering/UserCamera.hh:28,
                 from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/gui/building/BuildingMaker.cc:24:
/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo/msgs/MessageTypes.hh:2:22: fatal error: axis.pb.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
In file included from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:22:0,
                 from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/rendering/Visual.hh:31,
                 from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/gui/building/BuildingModelManip.hh:23,
                 from /tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/gazebo/gui/building/BuildingModelManip.cc:21:
/tmp/gazebo_test_pull_requests/build/gazebo/msgs/MessageTypes.hh:2:22: fatal error: axis.pb.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
make[2]: *** [gazebo/gui/building/CMakeFiles/gazebo_building.dir/moc_BuildingModelManip.cxx.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....

usually, issuing make again fixes things.
